NIGHTSCOUT.description: REQUIRED: NightScout URL, e.g. my-cgm.herokuapp.com or my-cgm.azurewebsites.net

MAKER_KEY.description: Your Maker Key, you could find it on https://ifttt.com/services/maker_webhooks/settings It's in the URL field after 'https://maker.ifttt.com/use/'

PUSHOVER_TOKEN.description: Pushover Token you get on https://pushover.net/

PUSHOVER_USER.description: Pushover User Key you get on https://pushover.net/

WEB_SERVER.description: REQUIRED: Do you want to use Web-Server(end-point are: '/json','/xml','/rss', and on json end-point you can use JSONP with callback query parameter). Possible values are on/off

LOW_BG.description: Low BG value you would like to get alert. For this use unit you use on you NightScout portal, if you use different unit, it's OK, application will convert it

HIGH_BG.description: High BG value you would like to get alert. For this use unit you use on you NightScout portal, if you use different unit, it's OK, application will convert it
